summary_markdown: This data outlines the cost structure associated with DVD production and distribution, presenting a breakdown of expenses per unit and fixed costs. Variable costs include the DVD package and disc at $2.50 per unit and royalties at $2.25 per unit. Fixed costs, incurred regardless of the number of DVDs produced, consist of advertising and promotion totaling $500,000 and overhead expenses amounting to $200,000. This structure highlights a cost model where per-unit expenses are supplemented by significant upfront investments in marketing and operational infrastructure.
